name: Forest Hunter
cardText: If you control at least 3 forest Land cards, Forest Hunter cannot be targeted by enemy spells or abilities.

name: Spirit Mage

name: Spell-Blade

name: Artificer

name: World Tree
cardText: World Tree must be played on a Forest Land tile you control. Forest lands you control cannot turn chaotic.

name: Endless Thicket
cardText: Until the start of your next turn, creatures you control attacking a Forest Tile get +1/+1. Lose 1 health.

name: Shooting Star
cardText: Destroy target permanent event. Lose 2 health.

name: Spirit Festival
cardText: At the beginning of your next turn, double the troop points you would otherwise generate, then destroy this card.

name: Bountiful Harvest
cardText: Choose a Gelweed Farmer you control. The farmer and all adjacent Troops you control get +0/+2.

name: Flash Flood
cardText: Attach Flash Flood to any Land tile. The owner of the tile must move any troop off of it as they normally would. If they can't, destroy the Troop, then destroy Flash Flood and lose 1 health.
